name: Robot Labyrinth
description:
Collect battery's to add to your time, +2 seconds

Collect screw's to add to your health, +15 Health

-5 power every second to 100,

-2 power every "Space" pressed,

-25 health if hit bad guy (Rusty),

-10 health if hit pellet,

Press "P" to go In Full-screen

Press "Space" to go to spawn,

Press "E" when near Key or Gate(if you have key),

Hold "L" or "Tab" to show leader-board.
